title: Drawing, "End Table", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: NOTE:/LAC. FINISH; lower right: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'-0"/#7285 [circled]; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for low end table. Squared edges of table with rounded corner at left. Shelf below surface on left side with rounded left corner. Table on low base of darker wood. Surface of table probably lacquered.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-861.
